summary: The meeting focused on the proforma and valuation model, highlighting several issues that need to be addressed. Key changes include renaming 'Units' to 'Rooms/Keys' for clarity. Additionally, there are concerns regarding the status bar during data extraction and the possibility of extracting data in the background to improve user experience.
decisions: Implement a status bar for data extraction.

items.title: Rename Units to Rooms/Keys
items.details: Update all relevant documentation and interfaces to reflect the change from 'Units' to 'Rooms/Keys'. Acceptance criteria include verification that all instances are updated and consistent across the platform.

items.title: Implement status bar for data extraction
items.details: Develop and integrate a status bar that displays progress during data extraction. Acceptance criteria include functionality testing and user feedback.

items.title: Explore background data extraction options
items.details: Research and propose solutions for implementing background data extraction to enhance user experience. Acceptance criteria include a report with recommendations and potential implementation timelines.
